Text: I am cautious about downloading security products, although i see that many others do not seem to be having any problems. As a general question, can anybody point out any concerns with downloading security wares? could they be compromised, allowing other malware access to the users system? has anybody got any comments or feedback? sam_code4u, I would appreciate your view on this....

Hi sam_codec4u, I was wondering if you could, when you have a chance, to put up Webroot Internet Security Complete. It's great program and I can't find it anywhere. Thanks bro, and keep up the great work!!
